title: I can't get into league
body: So i still have the legacy client and every time to try to open league it just goes to the launcher.Once i click launch nothing happens.How do i fix this?

replies.body: It almost sounds like you're dealing with some kind of permissions issue, where the client is trying to launch but isn't able to access its own files for some reason. Double check that you've got your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) setup in the best way, but let me know if that guide doesn't help.
